titulo: Approaches, verification and training for Edge-AI building blocks for CCAM Systems (CCAM Partnership)
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following expected outcomes:CCAM solutions - in hardware and software - with reduced power consumption, latency, and improved speed and accuracy, as domain specific adaptions of sector agnostic advancements in e.g. AI and/or cloud-edge-IoT technologies;Enhanced levels of safety, (cyber) security, privacy and ethical standards of data-driven CCAM functionalities by using e.g. edge-AI applications for CCAM;Approaches for wel
